name: Quimey Ultimate Space Adventure Terraforming Mars & Beyond
name_original: Quimey Ultimate Space Adventure Terraforming Mars & Beyond
description:
Play as Quimey, a little astronaut who has had to leave planet earth due to pollution and mismanagement of resources. Protect and terraform your new land on Mars, while preventing the aliens from destroying the last tree of humanity.

Shoot, build and terraform!

Controls:
- Move: A & D
- Aim & Shoot: Mouse & Click
- Select Build: 1-4
- Confirm Build: E
- Enter dome to upgrade your Weapon: E


Art by: Facundo Giovagnoli
Program by: Franco Aflalo

Thanks to Will Tice for the explotions sprites and to Alexandr Zhelanov for the awesome music.

Enjoy!
